jobDescription: Title: Data Scientist Location: New Brunswick, NJSalary: $120,000 - 130,000Contact: Paul Chatlos, pchatlos@smithhanley.comData Scientist Description Will be passionate about using data science to create better consumer experiences and reach the right person, at the right moment, with the right content. This person will be part of a team that drives Analytics for Marketing. This will be a hands-on role responsible for building algorithms to get the best ROI for marketing spend. You will have a direct impact on media by enabling data driven business decisions.Data Scientist Major Responsibilities:-Lead in developing sophisticated algorithms and data mining strategies -Develop consumer segmentation approaches -Work with data engineers and visualization experts-Translate data and model results into business strategies-Solve complex analytical questions-Develop ongoing data analysesData Scientist Qualifications:-Masters Degree in statistics, mathematics or other quantitative Field-3 or more years of experience in relevant analytics, data mining and modeling -Strong knowledge of SQL is required-Expert in Python and/or R -Experience working with large data sets for consumer clustering and segmentation -Developing and leveraging insights from the data and the analysis-Excellent oral and written communication skills-Strong Business acumen-Knowledge of sparkML, Scikit-learn, Apache Giraph or Mahout -Experience in marketing analytics
